title: Gazebo 1.3 pre-compiled for DRC expects Ogre 1.7.3

content.raw:
gazebo: error while loading shared libraries: libOgreRTShaderSystem.so.1.7.3: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory


Standard Precise 12.04 64-bit install uses Obgre 1.7.4:

$ apt-file search libOgreRTShaderSystem.so
libogre-1.7.4: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreRTShaderSystem.so.1.7.4
libogre-dev: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreRTShaderSystem.so
content.html:
gazebo: error while loading shared libraries: libOgreRTShaderSystem.so.1.7.3: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Standard Precise 12.04 64-bit install uses Obgre 1.7.4:

$ apt-file search libOgreRTShaderSystem.so libogre-1.7.4: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreRTShaderSystem.so.1.7.4 libogre-dev: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreRTShaderSystem.so
